item.title: Finding coordinates for cities, etc. with R
item.description: The problem: you have data that includes the name of a village or city in which something happened, but not coordinates for that village or city. This seems to be a pretty common problem, or at least I’ve come across it a few times. The (or a) solution is to look up the city names with the GeoNames database. Their website has a search feature and with that it’s pretty easy to figure out the coordinates for a city or village name.
